name: The meme forest (Olezhek2020) (Olezhek2020)
description:
a mysterious forest full of evil spirits. collect mushrooms to survive... the path will show the way .

WASD - walking

E - collect

Left mouse - murder (if there is a weapon)

shift - sneaking up silently.

HELP WITH PASSING

TO COMPLETE THE MEME FOREST GAME. YOU NEED TO COLLECT AND READ NOTES. THESE ARE HINTS. BEWARE OF EVIL SOULS, MEMES. FOLLOW THE PATH, IT WILL SHOW THE WAY. WANDERING THROUGH THE FOREST, YOU CAN SEE A FENCE AND A CAVE. IT'S NOT WORTH GOING TO THE CAVE NOW. IF YOU SEE A FENCE. THEN YOU NEED TO COLLECT 15 MUSHROOMS TO OPEN IT. FOLLOW ON AND YOU WILL SEE THE HOUSE. GO INTO IT. YOU NEED TO GO FORWARD ALONG A LONG CORRIDOR, AND RAISE THE CROSS. THE CROSS IS A WEAPON WITH WHICH YOU CAN KILL MEMES. NOW YOU NEED TO GO TO THE CAVE AND FIGHT THE MAIN BOSS. BY DEFEATING HIM. YOU WILL COMPLETE THE GAME. good luck!
